item.title: By: Android Guide for non-Android Users « Bleacher Views
item.dc:creator: Android Guide for non-Android Users « Bleacher Views
item.description: [...] benefit is push-syncing of data from my Android phone, over the web, to my Google account in “the cloud.“ Since I use Gmail as my primary email account (with my work emails forwarded to it), and [...]

item.title: By: How Dropbox Rocks Your Sox Off « Bleacher Views

item.description: [...] the simplest way I could put it, Dropbox is a “Cloud” storage system. It is a program that allows for the instant, seamless, and secure synchronization of files, [...]
